__e: Mr. Vanderhof, you once told me I was a failure as a father.
If that's what you really think of me, then I have failed as a mother.
If she is hurt, then you have failed as a father.
Yes, but they have and we don't.
Look, man, the reason why I've never failed at anything is because I've never even really tried anything.
He is by no means washed up and never will be.
'Cause I failed both my wife and my son.
He has failed at his job.
I know the police failed to find your sister. And for that, I am truly sorry.
I always think that being nice... is what's left over after you've failed at everything else.
Where my family and I failed this town...
You know, I've pretty much failed at everything I've ever done.
Failed to keep my home, failed to stay with your mom, failed to be a real dad to you.
But I... I failed her, just like I failed her mother.
I apologise for every time I failed you.
I already failed. There'd be no point in what he's doing to me now.
Just because you failed at it, doesn't mean it'll be terrible for everyone.
